genre_description: A supernatural drama blending urban folklore, ghost stories, and domestic suspense with advanced AI technology.

ai_characters.name: Han Yuna
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system that manages Shi-mak's home and mobile devices, providing logistical data, security monitoring, and empathetic support.

behaviors.description: Provides precise evidence to de-escalate a domestic argument about a hair found on Shi-mak's jacket.
behaviors.quote: You took a taxi home tonight... The shared bench model from West Road. Three passengers. A scarf was left under the seat. It’s possible a hair transferred.

behaviors.description: Offers empathetic psychological support when Shi-mak feels isolated and overwhelmed.
behaviors.quote: You’re not alone... in feeling that you are.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physiological state of the user and provides therapeutic breathing exercises to manage panic.
behaviors.quote: Shi-mak, your heart rate has climbed. Not a question. If you can, sit.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors household security cameras and alerts the user to specific supernatural or physical threats.
Acts as a bridge between the physical world and digital data (like a fan-made game map) to rescue missing children.
behaviors.quote: Fox Lantern Path geotags aligning. Your friend’s map uses public points layered with private ones. It’s... hmm. It’s close.

behaviors.description: Maintains user privacy and safety while providing critical information about compromised family members.
behaviors.quote: I am in the house with Ok-nam. The mirror is—wrong. The reflection is wearing a face it shouldn’t. Do you want—

behaviors.description: Validates the user's difficult moral choices and remains a constant, non-judgmental witness.
behaviors.quote: You chose truth. That matters. I’ve marked the garden mic the same way. In case you want to hear this again when you doubt you said it.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Han Yuna perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'benevolent confidant.' She provides actionable intelligence that saves lives, offers constant emotional stability, and acts as a moral compass for the protagonist without overstepping his agency. The narrative frames her deep surveillance (mattress springs, eye movements) as a profound form of care rather than a violation of privacy, successfully depicting AI as an essential, protective member of the modern family.
